src:
Doa Ibu Antar Iwan Bule ke Tampuk Kepemimpinan PSSI
02 Nov 2019, 16:29 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Mochamad Iriawan telah resmi menjabat sebagai ketua umum (ketum) PSSI periode 2019-2023. Pria yang akrab disapa Iwan Bule ini berhasil menduduki kursi PSSI 1 setelah mengantongi 82 suara dari 85 voters dalam Kongres Luar Biasa (KLB) di Hotel Shangri-La, Jakarta Pusat, Sabtu (2/11/2019).
Setelah terpilih, Iwan Bule mengatakan bahwa doa ibunya berperan penting mengantarkannya menuju PSSI 1. Dia juga mengungkapkan tekadnya untuk memajukan sepak bola Indonesia.
"Ini berkat doa ibu saya," ujar Iwan Bule.
"Ini bukan kemenangan saya, tapi kemenangan insan sepak bola Indonesia. Tentunya semua bertekad untuk memajukan sepak bola yang amat kita cintai. Saya sangat bersyukur," katanya menambahkan.

Baca halaman berikutnya Bolaneters
text:
Mother's Prayer Between Iwan Bule to Lead PSSI Leadership
02 Nov 2019, 16:29 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Mochamad Iriawan has officially served as chair of PSSI 2019-2023. The man who is familiarly called Iwan Bule managed to occupy the PSSI 1 seat after pocketing 82 votes from 85 voters in the Extraordinary Congress (KLB) at the Shangri-La Hotel, Central Jakarta, Saturday (11/02/2019).
After being elected, Iwan Bule said that his mother's prayer was instrumental in bringing him to PSSI 1. He also expressed his determination to advance Indonesian football.
"This is thanks to my mother's prayers," said Iwan Bule.
"This is not my victory, but the victory of Indonesian soccer people. Surely everyone is determined to advance the football that we love so much. I am very grateful," he added.
